commitResults.messageTitle: Level-0. Changed the name of the chatbot from Duke to Yoyo. Added greeting and exit.
Level-1. Echo and modifications to readme Added an echo function to the chatbot to respond to input. Modified readme file
Level-2. Add,list Add the ability to store the text entered by the user and display back to the user when requested.
Code reconstruction Split functions into multiple classes and methods. Created Chatbot class and Items class.
Level-3 Add the ability to mark tasks as done, and the ability to change the task back to not done

Level-4 Add support for tracking three new types ToDos: tasks without any date/time attached to it Deadlines: tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time Events: tasks that start at a specific date/time and ends at a specific date/time
A-TextUiTesting Add the ability to semi-automate the testing of Yoyo.
Level-5 Error Handling Add the ability of error handling to detect errors in input for all the tasks.
Level-6 Delete Functionality Add the ability to delete a task. Add the exception handling logics for deleting tasks.
Error handling Fixed a bug in mark/unmark error handling to reject index smaller or equal to zero.
Code Documentation Add comments to major methods to explain what they do.

Add tasks save functionality Introduce a new TaskFile class to handle logics about reading and writing to a txt file for tasks information storage. Add taskOutput method to Task, ToDos, Deadlines and Events class to output tasks information in an easy to manipulate way. Add fileOutput method to Tasks class to organise each task information in a single String. Add an overloaded storeTask method to Tasks class to store tasks information from file. Add readTask and saveTask methods to Chatbot class to handle read and save tasks logic.
Refactor Task class Small edits to Task class.
Merge "branch-Level-7"

Add Date support The app now understand dates for deadline and events tasks. Deadline dates, Events from and to dates are now stored as LocalDate variable. Add checkDate method to Tasks class to check any tasks are active on a specific date. Add getType method to Task, ToDos, Deadlines and Events class to return the type of the tasks. Add checkDate method to Task, ToDos, Deadlines and Events class to return if the task is active on the date.
Merge "branch-Level-8"

A-MoreOOP, Refactor of Chatbot Class, introduce Command and Parser class Move tasks parsing logics from Chatbot class to Parser class. Move tasks execution logics from Chatbot class to Command class. Parser class creates Task variable based on the input given. Command class executes all the tasks.
Merge "A-MoreOOP"
A-Packages Organize classes into different packages for better future maintainability.
Merge branch "A-Packages"
Merge branch 'add-gradle-support' of https://github.com/gaoze24/ip into A-Gradle
Merge "A-Gradle"
Junit Test Add test class for each class in the project.
Junit Test, ParserTest, CommandTest Add test methods for Parser class and Command class.
Junit Test Add test methods for Chatbot, Deadlines, Events, TaskFile, Task, Task, ToDos class.
A-JUnit Add JUnit tests to test the behavior of the code.
Merge branch "A-JUnit"
A-Jar A small change in UI.
Merge branch "A-Jar"
A-JavaDoc Add JavaDoc comments for all classes and methods.
A-CodingStandard Restructures the project to comply with coding standard.
Level-9 Add find word function, allows the user to search for tasks based on a keyword.
Merge branch "A-JavaDoc"
Merge branch "A-CodingStandard"
Merge branch "Level-9"
Fix CheckStyle violations and configure CheckStyle
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add CheckStyle plugin to build.gradle
- Add CheckStyle configuration and suppression files
- Fix various linting issues:
    - Standardize import ordering
    - Correct naming conventions (e.g., camelCase for methods)
    - Remove redundant spacing and formatting inconsistencies
    - Refactor magic strings into constants (e.g., HORIZONTAL_LINE)

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge "branch-A-CheckStyle"
GUI setup
Level-10 GUI
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement JavaFX GUI with FXML styling and responsive layout

Completed the transition from a text-based interface to a modern
graphical user interface. Key improvements include:

- Core Logic Refactoring: Modified Tasks and Command classes to return
  response strings, enabling the GUI to capture and display output.
- FXML Integration: Migrated layout definitions to FXML files
  (MainWindow.fxml, DialogBox.fxml) and implemented dedicated
  controllers for better separation of concerns.
- Visual Design: Applied a modern light theme inspired by Gemini using
  CSS, featuring rounded chat bubbles, custom scrollbars, and a
  responsive AnchorPane layout.
- UX & Stability:
    - Added minimum window dimensions (400x600).
    - Implemented auto-resizing with `fitToWidth` to ensure content
      remains stable and fills the window correctly.
    - Added an initial welcome message from Yoyo.
- Test Suite Update: Refactored existing tests to align with the new
  string-return logic, ensuring all 43 tests pass.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge "branch-Level-10"
GUI
commitResults.messageBody:
Add missing FXML, CSS, and image resources for GUI

Includes the layout and styling files required for the JavaFX
interface that were omitted in the previous commit:

- Add MainWindow.fxml and DialogBox.fxml for UI layout.
- Add main.css for Gemini-inspired light theme styling.
- Add user and chatbot avatar images to resources.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Javadoc
commitResults.messageBody: Add Javadoc for DialogBox.java and MainWindow.java

commitResults.messageTitle: Add java assertions to document and verify assumptions
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Java `assert` statements across several key classes to document
and test important assumptions about input validity and internal
state. This improves codebase robustness by catching invalid states
during development.

Key changes:
- yoyo.command.Parser: Verify input and tasks list are non-null.
- yoyo.command.Command: Verify tasks and task objects are non-null.
- yoyo.task.Tasks: Add index range checks for task operations.
- yoyo.task.Task: Verify description and type in constructors.
- yoyo.task.TaskFile: Ensure written messages are non-null.
- yoyo.task.Deadlines/Events: Verify date strings before parsing.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #1 from gaoze24/branch-A-Assertions
commitResults.messageBody: Add java assertions to document and verify assumptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Code quality improvement
commitResults.messageBody:
Improve the quality of code by renaming some key classes/methods.
Improve the logic control for all the conditionals.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge brach-A-CodeQuality
Implement automatic task sorting by date
commitResults.messageBody:
Added a `sortTask` method to the `Tasks` class to automatically sort tasks
whenever a new task is added. Tasks are sorted based on their due dates:
- Deadlines use their deadline date.
- Events use their start date.
- Tasks without dates (e.g., ToDos) are automatically placed at the start
  of the list.

Changes include:
- Added `getDate()` to the `Task` base class and overrode it in `Deadline`
  and `Event`.
- Implemented sorting logic in `Tasks#sortTask()` using `Comparator`.
- Added unit tests in `TasksTest` to verify correct sorting behavior.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch-C-Sort
Small change to README
